div.b: Grove School Closed through April 6 - Distance Learning Model (Update 4/1)

b.a: Middle School Class Codes and Meeting Times

div.div: Shawnee Public Library (all grade levels) - https://www.pioneerlibrarysystem.org - If you do not have a library card, you may apply for one by clicking "Apply" toward the bottom of their homepage. Be sure to include an email address when you apply, and they will email you a digital library card number. This will allow you to access their digital content immediately.
Students will need their username and password.

font.span: Age of Learning- Select the underlined text for information and resources

ul.li: Give your child a topic and have them write about it.

Have your child: Research a person, place, event, culture, animal, etc., then write about their research. Make a costume, artifact, map, etc. related to their research. Do a presentation, and capture it on video to share with family/friends (if you so choose).
Teach your child life skills such as cooking, sewing, budgeting, count money, make a schedule, address an envelope, etc.
Play board games or card games.
Physical activity is important. If you have a safe place to get outside (without congregating!), go outside and play! There are also many online resources for dance videos, exercise videos, etc.
Write a letter to a loved one that you may not be able to visit right now.
Write a play, and act it out!
Build with Legos, Lincoln logs, etc.

li.b: Please visit the CDC and Oklahoma State Department of Health websites for the most accurate and updated information concerning the Coronavirus.
View Your Child's Test Scores Online
li.br:
You can now view your child's 2017 and 2018 Oklahoma State Testing Programs scores online.
https://okparentportal.emetric.net/login
You will need your child's ten-digit State ID number, located on Wen-GAGE (ok.wengage.com/GroveS) beside your child's picture, and your child's birthdate.
Always be in the know. Bookmark our calendar page!

li.b: Are you visiting our FaceBook page?
li.br: If you aren't using our FaceBook page you are missing a lot of information. Select the "Like Us" button below to keep track of important news and information from the school. Visit our FaceBook page often at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Grove-School/244724652212862.

div.class: dmRespCol small-12 u_1690177595 medium-12 large-12 empty-column

div.font: Grove School is a Pre-Kindergarten through Eighth Grade Public Elementary School District located in Shawnee, Oklahoma. Grove School has been a leader in educating students in Pottawatomie County since 1893! Located on the outskirts of Shawnee, Oklahoma, our community school sits on twelve acres. Grove School provides rigorous, full day educational programs for ten grade levels, four-year-olds through eighth grade, while maintaining a small school, nurturing environment. The current student population is approximately 550, allowing for a teacher to student ratio of approximately 1:19. With a staff of highly qualified and caring individuals, Grove School provides a safe educational environment with high academic expectations for student success.
